job_tasks.phrase: Collaborating with customers to understand their AI needs and requirements, assisting the customer to understanding the impact of Generative AI in their business, and making concrete and informed decisions on implementation.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly describes understanding customer needs and aligning AI solutions with business impact and decision-making.

job_tasks.phrase: Leading face-to-face workshops and training sessions to educate customers on AI technologies and best practices.
job_tasks.justification: Educating customers on AI technologies and best practices involves understanding business needs and communicating the value of AI.

job_tasks.phrase: Developing and implementing AI solutions and POCs tailored to customer projects, ensuring high quality and efficiency.
job_tasks.justification: Developing and implementing AI solutions and POCs directly relates to the creation and application of AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: Conducting research and exploration of new AI products and services offered by Google Cloud's GenAI platform.
job_tasks.justification: Exploring new AI products and services, especially within a GenAI platform, implies working with and understanding generative models.

job_tasks.phrase: Working closely with cross-functional teams to integrate AI capabilities into our products and services.
job_tasks.justification: Integrating AI capabilities into products and services is a core software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Providing technical expertise and guidance on AI-related projects and initiatives.
job_tasks.justification: Providing technical expertise and guidance on AI projects falls under the broader umbrella of software development and engineering.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborating with customers to understand their AI needs and requirements
Leading face-to-face workshops and training sessions to educate customers on AI technologies and best practices.
making concrete and informed decisions on implementation.
Conducting research and exploration of new AI products and services
drive innovation and create impactful solutions

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes Generative AI (GenAI) and collaboration with customers to implement AI solutions. It includes research into GenAI products and the development of AI solutions tailored to customer projects, aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.
